nodes.text: AA-1 VerboBrain was a model of verbobrain manufactured by SynthTech that was able to store tremendous ammounts of information in a droid's active memory banks and calculate complex scenarios. It was used in high-end protocol droids, including Cybot Galactica's 3PO-series protocol droid. While the L-1g general purpose droid was most commonly used for basic operational tasks, it was also equipped with an AA-1 VerboBrain.
